theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial ROS generation rates correlating with lifespan and antioxidant defenses modulating aging.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes mitochondria as main ROS source and discusses mitochondrial-targeted antioxidant interventions.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights mitochondrial ROS production, damage accumulation, and therapeutic antioxidant implications.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links mitochondrial heteroplasmy caused by ROS to aging, focusing on mitochondrial DNA damage.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes mitochondrial ROS accumulation causing damage and aging, with antioxidant intervention potential.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Connects metabolic rate to ROS production and aging, emphasizing mitochondrial free radical damage.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial dysfunction as a source and target of oxidative stress driving aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses ROS imbalance involving mitochondrial enzymes and lipid peroxidation contributing to aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Integrates mitochondrial electron transport chain malfunctions producing ROS with aging as a reliability problem.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes ROS accumulation from mitochondrial metabolism and pro-oxidant effects accelerating aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on balance of mitochondrial ROS and antioxidant defenses determining aging rate.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Oxidative Stress and Disease-Linked Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes systemic oxidative stress causing vascular damage and age-related diseases like atherosclerosis and diabetes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Oxidative Stress and Disease-Linked Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on oxidative damage accumulation in yeast replicative aging and decline in antioxidant defenses.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Oxidative Stress and Disease-Linked Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links oxidative stress and antioxidant decline to sarcopenia and systemic aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Oxidative Stress and Disease-Linked Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Connects oxidative damage to activation of inflammatory pathways driving aging-associated inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Oxidative Stress and Disease-Linked Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes oxidative stress triggering chronic inflammation and neurodegeneration in aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Oxidative Stress and Disease-Linked Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on protein oxidation as a driver of tissue aging and systemic functional decline.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Oxidative Stress and Disease-Linked Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights oxidative damage accumulation and redox modifications as biomarkers in brain aging and neurodegeneration.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Oxidative Stress and Disease-Linked Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: General oxidative damage accumulation causing cellular and molecular dysfunction in aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Oxidative Stress and Disease-Linked Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes imbalance between free radicals and antioxidant defenses leading to oxidative stress and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Oxidative Stress and Disease-Linked Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on oxidative stress resilience and damage in brain aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Oxidative Stress and Disease-Linked Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links oxidative damage to energy imbalance, homeostatic decline, and frailty in aging.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes oxidative stress causing cellular senescence, DNA damage, and chronic inflammation driving brain aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Cellular Senescence and Inflammation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes free radical reactions causing cellular damage modifiable by genetics/environment, linking aging and disease.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Cellular Senescence and Inflammation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Applies systems reliability theory to stochastic free radical damage in critical structures causing aging.
